title: "Artificial intelligence could prevent sight loss in people with diabetes and save NHS millions"
excerpt: "Results from the largest study of artificial intelligence use in the English Diabetic Eye Screening Programme (DESP), have shown that the technology can accurately detect serious eye disease among those with diabetes (retinopathy) and could halve the human workload associated with screening for diabetic eye disease,"
